subject: Configurable XML file in JUNIT to set different sets of values to a test method
msgSnippet: Hi I m looking for a configurable XML file in JUNIT to set different sets of values to a test method . So that the values can be configurable by a layman. So
messageBody:
Hi

I'm looking for a configurable XML file in JUNIT to set different sets
of values to a test method . So that the values can be configurable by
a layman. So pl help me on this.
